Text: The majority of the tugs are built in the early '50s or '70s while there are some that were commissioned in the mid '40s. The 90% of them needs replacement.
Cause: The majority of the tugs are built in the early '50s or '70s while there are some that were commissioned in the mid '40s.
Sentence: <e1>The majority of the tugs are built in the early '50s or '70s while there are some that were commissioned in the mid '40s.</e1> <e2>The 90% of them needs replacement.</e2>
